trans-unit.source: Provides data for the events: <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall" />.
trans-unit.target: 为下列事件提供数据：<see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall" />、<see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall" />、<see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing" />、<see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed" />、<see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback" />、<see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback" />、<see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall" />、<see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> contains an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that holds information about the current state of the installation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> 包含<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>保存安装的当前状态有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall> event handlers use this information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback>， <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall>，和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall>事件处理程序使用此信息。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructors and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>构造函数和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A>属性<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs>类。

trans-unit.source: There are two new events called `BeforeCommit` and `AfterCommit`.
trans-unit.target: 有两个新的事件调用`BeforeCommit`和`AfterCommit`。

trans-unit.source: The handlers of these events are invoked from the protected methods named `OnBeforeCommit` and `OnAfterCommit` respectively.
trans-unit.target: 从受保护的方法名为调用这些事件的处理程序`OnBeforeCommit`和`OnAfterCommit`分别。

trans-unit.source: These events are raised when the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 会引发这些事件时<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs" /> class, and leaves the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState" /> property empty.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs" /> 类的新实例，并保留 <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState" /> 属性为空。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructors and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>构造函数和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A>属性<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs>类。

trans-unit.source: There are two new events called `BeforeCommit` and `AfterCommit`.
trans-unit.target: 有两个新的事件调用`BeforeCommit`和`AfterCommit`。

trans-unit.source: The handlers of these events are invoked from the protected methods named `OnBeforeCommit` and `OnAfterCommit` respectively.
trans-unit.target: 从受保护的方法名为调用这些事件的处理程序`OnBeforeCommit`和`OnAfterCommit`分别。

trans-unit.source: These events are raised when the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 会引发这些事件时<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that represents the current state of the installation.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前安装状态的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs" /> class, and specifies the value for the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs" /> 类的新实例，并指定 <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructors and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>构造函数和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A>属性<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs>类。

trans-unit.source: There are two new events called `BeforeCommit` and `AfterCommit`.
trans-unit.target: 有两个新的事件调用`BeforeCommit`和`AfterCommit`。

trans-unit.source: The handlers of these events are invoked from the protected methods named `OnBeforeCommit` and `OnAfterCommit` respectively.
trans-unit.target: 从受保护的方法名为调用这些事件的处理程序`OnBeforeCommit`和`OnAfterCommit`分别。

trans-unit.source: These events are raised when the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 会引发这些事件时<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that represents the current state of the installation.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示当前安装状态的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that represents the current state of the installation.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前安装状态的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructors and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>构造函数和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A>属性<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs>类。

trans-unit.source: There are two new events called `BeforeCommit` and `AfterCommit`.
trans-unit.target: 有两个新的事件调用`BeforeCommit`和`AfterCommit`。

trans-unit.source: The handlers of these events are invoked from the protected methods named `OnBeforeCommit` and `OnAfterCommit` respectively.
trans-unit.target: 从受保护的方法名为调用这些事件的处理程序`OnBeforeCommit`和`OnAfterCommit`分别。

trans-unit.source: These events are raised when the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 会引发这些事件时<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>调用方法。
